item.title: By: Will Sanders
item.dc:creator: Will Sanders
item.description: Thanks for that Judy, it is cool to hear from you, I hope you are well.
item.content:encoded: Thanks for that Judy, it is cool to hear from you, I hope you are well.

item.title: By: Judy H.
item.dc:creator: Judy H.
item.description:
Hey Will!
I'm so enjoying your blog posts...your life sounds so amazing and interesting there!!! I hope you are becoming more immune to the 4am wake up calls!
take care, and I will definitely keep up with you via the blog!
Judy
item.content:encoded:
Hey Will!

I’m so enjoying your blog posts…your life sounds so amazing and interesting there!!! I hope you are becoming more immune to the 4am wake up calls!

take care, and I will definitely keep up with you via the blog!

Judy

item.title: By: Will Sanders
item.dc:creator: Will Sanders
item.description: Hey Andrew, that is great news. Enjoy it. If you have any more questions I am really more than happy so ask away, more people should be figuring this out too. Have fun over there, be careful and all that, and let me know if you find any no holds bared Taipai death matches.
item.content:encoded: Hey Andrew, that is great news. Enjoy it. If you have any more questions I am really more than happy so ask away, more people should be figuring this out too. Have fun over there, be careful and all that, and let me know if you find any no holds bared Taipai death matches.

item.title: By: Andrew Carlisle
item.dc:creator: Andrew Carlisle
item.description: Indonesia sounds pretty great and terrifying at the same time. I'm loving your postings. Keep em coming. We just had our interviews a couple days ago for our Taiwan jobs. Should know in a week or so. Then we'd be over in your part of the world in a little over three months! Thanks again for all the awesome advice. Good luck with everything!
item.content:encoded: Indonesia sounds pretty great and terrifying at the same time. I’m loving your postings. Keep em coming. We just had our interviews a couple days ago for our Taiwan jobs. Should know in a week or so. Then we’d be over in your part of the world in a little over three months! Thanks again for all the awesome advice. Good luck with everything!

item.title: By: mark
item.dc:creator: mark
item.description: Hahaha...warned you about the masjid dude - 7 months in and they still get on my tits (not my dead grandmothers). Actually have a tentative plan to get some people to go to pulau madura from 20th to 24th may...will let u know details f u wanna join. N please tell more about ur travel plans...in june i go gillis then, after i drop by to see ur sorry ass, head off to maluku and papua for 10 weeks of adventure :) Sampai jumpa lagi
item.content:encoded:
Hahaha…warned you about the masjid dude – 7 months in and they still get on my tits (not my dead grandmothers). Actually have a tentative plan to get some people to go to pulau madura from 20th to 24th may…will let u know details f u wanna join. N please tell more about ur travel plans…in june i go gillis then, after i drop by to see ur sorry ass, head off to maluku and papua for 10 weeks of adventure :)
Sampai jumpa lagi

item.title: By: Mom
item.dc:creator: Mom
item.description: Hey, wonderful blog site. Remember the story about the lighthouse keeper? The foghorn didn't go off one time, and he jumped out of bed yelling "what was that?" You may just fall into the rhythm of the Imam. This is a great way to get news. You are having an adventure for all of us...... Terima koshi. love, Mom
item.content:encoded:
Hey, wonderful blog site. Remember the story about the lighthouse keeper? The foghorn didn’t go off one time, and he jumped out of bed yelling “what was that?” You may just fall into the rhythm of the Imam. This is a great way to get news. You are having an adventure for all of us…… Terima koshi.
love,
Mom

item.title: By: Will Sanders
item.dc:creator: Will Sanders
item.description: No, no, no. I did know her name, she is Parmi, I had just neglected to tell her mine. She was following me around quizing me on it. Now we communicate with a lot of hand gestures, the other night my room mates Indonesian Girlfriend told me Parmi told her I could speak Indonesian. So now that we are straight on the names we communicate just fine. But you are right, I am a lazy pampered round eye, no doubt.
item.content:encoded: No, no, no. I did know her name, she is Parmi, I had just neglected to tell her mine. She was following me around quizing me on it. Now we communicate with a lot of hand gestures, the other night my room mates Indonesian Girlfriend told me Parmi told her I could speak Indonesian. So now that we are straight on the names we communicate just fine. But you are right, I am a lazy pampered round eye, no doubt.

item.title: By: Carson
item.dc:creator: Carson
item.description: tell your maid I said hello! two of many things I love about that story - you had a beautiful idea while competely overlooking the most obvious and, apparantly, you didn't bother to find out her name, you lazy pampered round eye!
item.content:encoded: tell your maid I said hello! two of many things I love about that story – you had a beautiful idea while competely overlooking the most obvious and, apparantly, you didn’t bother to find out her name, you lazy pampered round eye!

item.title: By: Will Sanders
item.dc:creator: Will Sanders
item.description: Louder? Good news is I actually get a week off for Ramadan. I will be in Indonesia but running around doing my thing. So far it seems like people in Indonesia drink beer. There was this yellow shit in Sumatra that came fermented out of the tops of palm trees called Tuack but I don't see any here. I still don't know the local ghetto drink. But if such an animal exists have no doubt or fear I will make an ass out of myself while drinking it. Of that we must all be certain.
item.content:encoded: Louder? Good news is I actually get a week off for Ramadan. I will be in Indonesia but running around doing my thing. So far it seems like people in Indonesia drink beer. There was this yellow shit in Sumatra that came fermented out of the tops of palm trees called Tuack but I don’t see any here. I still don’t know the local ghetto drink. But if such an animal exists have no doubt or fear I will make an ass out of myself while drinking it. Of that we must all be certain.

item.title: By: Doug Brown
item.dc:creator: Doug Brown
item.description: It tends to get louder during Ramadan, if my experience is to be any guide here. So you got that look forward to. Unless yr texting plan takes off. You still on sham status? Working your maid to the bone, one assumes, while drinking, wait, what does one drink in Indonesia anyhow?
item.content:encoded: It tends to get louder during Ramadan, if my experience is to be any guide here. So you got that look forward to. Unless yr texting plan takes off. You still on sham status? Working your maid to the bone, one assumes, while drinking, wait, what does one drink in Indonesia anyhow?
